mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, nickname, avatar, gender, birthday, target_school, target_major, exam_year, study_stage, signature, create_time, update_time FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profile ( user_id, nickname, avatar, gender, birthday, target_school, target_major, exam_year, study_stage, signature ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{targetSchool}, #{targetMajor}, #{examYear}, #{studyStage}, #{signature} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_profile
nickname = #{nickname},
avatar = #{avatar},
gender = #{gender},
birthday = #{birthday},
target_school = #{targetSchool},
target_major = #{targetMajor},
exam_year = #{examYear},
study_stage = #{studyStage},
signature = #{signature},
WHERE user_id = #{userId}
